'(
wordrule
(
  (ruleid "BOC-:ENLARGEMENT-OF-THE-HEART:-0-2018/11/08 14:13:17") 
  (specialized) 
  (example-snippet "Heart size is normal") 
  (ordered true) 
  (concept ":ENLARGEMENT-OF-THE-HEART:") 
  (stype "<CHEST-XRAY-FINDING-THING>") 
  (bagofconcepts true) 
  (words 
    (":HEART::NORMAL:")) 
  (properties (directionality negated))
  (tests 
    ("notneg" ?0)))

)
